summary: Jerranium 90, a "little rock" that made all the papers, is buried deep within the Amazon. And everybody wants it, including crooked importer Handscomb Draile, slimy Gondreau Slykes, cheap ... See full summary »

Wynant|Frank Dietz|Christine Romeo|Brian Howe|Fay Masterson|Robert Deveau|Kevin Quinn|Larry Blamire|Daniel Roebuck|Susan McConnell|Andrew Parks|Dan Conroy|Trish Geiger|Jennifer Blaire|Alison Martin|John Stuart West|Frank Ippolito|David J. title: The Lost Skeleton Returns Again
